content: olivia s butterfly this is a very simple hat and very quick to make using a j hook and worsted weight yarn i used red heart and it fits a 20 1/2 inch head very nicely very easily adjustible by either adding increase row or taking away round 1 ch3 11dc in 3rd chain from hook 11dc slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet now and through out round 2 ch2 does not count as double_crochet now and through out 2dc in each st around slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet round 3 chain 2 * 2dc in first st 1dc in next st around repeat from * around slip st to join round 4 ch2 *2dc in first st double_crochet in next 2dc repeat from * around join round 5 ch2 * 2dc in first st double_crochet in next 3dc repeat from * around join round 6 ch2 double_crochet in same st and each st around round 7 and 8 repeat round 6 round 9 ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 21 sts ch10 skip next 9 sts double_crochet in next st and in each st accross slip st to join round 10 ch2 double_crochet in same st and in next 21 sts chain 10 skip 10 chains double_crochet in next double_crochet and in each remaining double_crochet slip st to join round 11 and 12 repeat round 10 round 13 ch1 single_crochet in same st and in next 21 sts ch5 single_crochet over all chain 10 s by bunching together and into 5th double_crochet of the 9 skipped double_crochet on row 9 ch5 single_crochet in next double_crochet and in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to join fasten_off i hope you can see in the pic how i did row 13 please feel free to sell your creations as you like just maybe link to my pattern or tag with my website thanks and happy hooking
